column1: A funeral service will be held on Tuesday June 16
column2: 2015 at 11:00 am at  Forbis & Dick Pleasant Garden Chapel. Interment will follow in Westminster Gardens Cemetery. The family will receive friends on Monday from 6:00 until 8:00 PM at Forbis & Dick Pleasant Garden Chapel. The family wishes to express their gratitude to the staff at Whitestone Care & Wellness Center
column3: Heritage Greens Retirement Community and Hospice and Palliative Care of Greensboro  for their care and support.
